articles.title: Samsung expects profits to soar with boost from AI - BBC.com
articles.description: The South Korean tech giant is benefiting from the AI  boom which has lifted the prices of advanced chips.
articles.content:
Samsung Electronics expects its profits for the three months to June 2024 to jump 15-fold compared to the same period last year.
An artificial intelligence (AI) boom has lifted the prices of advance… [+1487 chars]
